definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of lava and debris valleys is a U-shaped transverse profile.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩流及泥石流谷的特点之一是横剖面为U型。

sentences.english: At last, the authors presented the standard to judge debris flow changing its course in grooves.
sentences.chinese: 创建了沟谷泥石流流通沟槽发生改道运动的判断标准。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the situation of underground debris flow in Chengchao Mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了程潮铁矿几次井下泥石流发生情况。

sentences.english: Tiger Leaping Gorge, we were caught in a traffic due to debris flow.
sentences.chinese: 从香格里拉到虎跳峡的路上，因泥石流出现堵车。

sentences.english: A woman grieves near her relative's body after dozens of people were killed in landslides in China's Gansu province last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，中国甘肃爆发泥石流，造成许多人死亡。

sentences.english: Flooding or additional slides may occur after a landslide or mudflow.
sentences.chinese: 滑坡或泥石流结束后可能会有洪水或其他的碎屑。

sentences.english: The mud-rock flow submerged the whole village.
sentences.chinese: 泥石流埋没了整个村庄。

sentences.english: Xiaojiang River basin in northeast Yunnan is one of the areas suffering severe debris-flow damages in China.
sentences.chinese: 云南东北部的小江流域是我国泥石流灾害严重地区。

sentences.english: In total, slides have killed five people in the Cuzco region.
sentences.chinese: 在库斯科地区泥石流总共已使5人丧生。

sentences.english: The slope debris flows may be controlled by construction of drainage systems and reforestation.
sentences.chinese: 建排水系统和发育植被可以最终控制坡面泥石流。

sentences.english: A debris-flow deposit containing large blocks.
sentences.chinese: 一种内含大岩块的泥石流沉积。

sentences.english: According to Taiwanese television reports, a mudslide may have buried another village in Pingtung county.
sentences.chinese: 中国台湾电视台报道，泥石流淹没了屏东县的另村庄。

sentences.english: The authors briefly depicted the development features of mudflow hazard in Dashuiqing gully in Binchuan County.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了宾川县大水箐泥石流灾害的发育特征。

sentences.english: The river was jammed up by a landslide, now that may burst.
sentences.chinese: 河流现在由于泥石流挤成了堰塞湖，现在可能溃堤。

sentences.english: The downpour triggered floods and mudslides along the Bailong River in Zhouqu County.
sentences.chinese: 降雨在白龙江沿岸再次引发山洪和泥石流。

sentences.english: Macaogou Gully is a typical disastrous debris flow in Wudu County, Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 马槽沟是一条典型的灾害性泥石流沟。

definition: to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
